Articles.Content:
With recent inactivity of Nextech and either the shutdown or the transfer of the server we played on, my itch for Starmade has not been satisfied. Therefor, I am creating a new faction on a different server, and am in need of recruits. If anyone wants to join, just go ahead and do so.

Starmade is a free to play game for the moment.

Server: aetherion.h4v3n.com:4242

People in faction:

Noname117

Gag09

Starwhip

Xacktar

Sampa

[Jeremy]

I hope to see you there!

Edited August 30, 2015 by Noname117

We can have a fresh start?! WHOOOO!

Count me in!

This time, we probably shouldn't accept random faction requests, the home base gets really crowded, disorganized, and laggy. :/

Alright. Me and Gag have already gone some distance, so you're going to have to get yourself a jump ship

The server also appears to be having some issues as well. I'm online at the moment

Edited August 20, 2015 by Noname117
I might join later, if you'll have me. But...i'll need to be taught...total noob.
We need people right now. If you join now you and Starwhip could both head over to where me and Gag are right now.
Ok..but first...i need to finish making an account...plus...i'm hangin out with xan on another game (when done studyinging in lass than 15 minutes

Well then, it looks like I could try to get you two on the server tomorrow then. It would probably be better if we could get both you and Starwhip online at the same time so you could both jump down to me and Gag.
fair enough!
I'm on the server. Wow. The mining bonuses are INSANE.
Indeed. I'll be on after breakfast most likely
I won't be on until I get home from school later today
Wow i was imagining something like this
Good. If anyone wants to join now, me, Starwhip and Gag are online at the moment
I'm still at school still

We've made it to another galaxy in my insta-warp ship.

This thing was, at one point, a blueprint AUS-1 Miner. I stripped everything we didn't need to have to warp, added a bunch more jump modules.
I have a lot to catch up with...
Of course, we could pick you up if need be
Ok, i'l let you know when i get on. Question, are we using any kind of voice chat or regular typing?
We've been using skype.

Ok, i'l let you know when i get on. Question, are we using any kind of voice chat or regular typing?

We're all Skype calling, and there is regular chat.
Ok, i have skype on my laptop..forgot my username...have to check when i get home...
Ok, starting it up for the first time! my skype name will be shared via private chat
You might be one version too far ahead. Starmade just updated but the server hasn't yet
rats... Actually, still trying to get into the game period!

Well, it's the shipyard update.

So much stuff we can do now. I'm probably going to start streaming shortly. (Once I backup Starmade. It'll be a singleplayer stream until the server has updated.)
